Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Relates to requiring the department of civil service to create and distribute a pamphlet regarding union membership of civil service employees
Summary: Requires the department of civil service to create and distribute an informational pamphlet regarding union membership of civil service employees.
LawCode: Add ยง154, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to requiring the department of civil service to create and distribute a pamphlet regarding union membership of civil service employees
